content: Introducing the enchanting Accord Royale, a mesmerizing fragrance that captures the essence of celestial beauty. A symphony of vibrant citrus and spicy pink pepper top notes harmoniously blend with the delicate floral heart notes of jasmine, lily of the valley, and rose, while the woody base notes of cashmeran and musk leave a lasting impression. This sophisticated and alluring scent is perfect for any occasion and is sure to leave an unforgettable impression.
